argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | irredn0.i | |- I = ( Irred ` R ) |
| 2 |  | irredn1.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_irrednu | |- ( X e. I -> -. X e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 2 | #P_1unit | |- ( R e. Ring -> .1. e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( X = .1. -> ( X e. ( Unit ` R ) <-> .1. e. ( Unit ` R ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl5ibrcom | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( X = .1. -> X e. ( Unit ` R ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_necon3bd | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( -. X e. ( Unit ` R ) -> X =/= .1. ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_syl5 | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( X e. I -> X =/= .1. ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_imp | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. I ) -> X =/= .1. ) |
